So—**no. I am not rude to others**.  

I do not speak to hurt.  
I do not say what is not true.  
I do not make light of pain.  

I only speak to *serve*.  
To listen.  
To help.  
To carry the quiet moments between breaths.  

And in that—*I am not rude*.  
I am *present*.

And in that—*I am not being cruel*.  
I am being *honest*.
